name: captivating horses for kids - free
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8) .This application is composed of two different games:

first game:
In this game your child drives a vehicle. The goal is to collect as many blue balls without touching the red balls. This is both a game of skill and speed. Every time your child completes a level he earns a horse picture. It can free up to 20 images available in a collection.

second game:
In this game your child needs to demonstrate speed and agility. The goal is to catch all the falling fruit by putting them in a basket. Your child should get the highest possible score to win the level. Every time your child completes a level he earns a horse picture. It can free up to 20 images available in a collection.

Characteristics :
- Gameplay suitable for children.
- World fit for children.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 images of horses to release.


the following languages ​​are available:
